title: Global Streetscapes (Segmentation)
description: Contains the count of segmented pixels of each semantic classes (65 categories in total) identified in the image.
creator: Yujun Hou
Matias Quintana
Maxim Khomiakov
Winston Yap
Jiani Ouyang
Koichi Ito
Zeyu Wang
Tianhong Zhao
Filip Biljecki
publisher: National University of Singapore Urban Analytics Lab
provider: Healthy Regions & Policies Lab, University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign
data_variables: Unique image ID, Source (Mapillary or KartaView), Orginal ID (by Mapillary or KartaView), Bird, Ground-Animal, Curb, Fence, Guard-Rail, Barrier, Wall, Bike-Lane, Crosswalk---Plain, Curb-Cut, Parking, Pedestrian-Area, Rail-Track, Road, Service-Lane, Sidewalk, Bridge, Building, Tunnel, Person, Bicyclist, Motorcyclist, Other-Rider, Lane-Marking---Crosswalk, Lane-Marking---General, Mountain, Sand, Sky, Snow, Terrain, Vegetation, Water, Banner, Bench, Bike-Rack, Billboard, Catch-Basin, CCTV-Camera, Fire-Hydrant, Junction-Box, Mailbox, Manhole, Phone-Booth, Pothole, Street-Light, Pole, Traffic-Sign-Frame, Utility-Pole, Traffic-Light, Traffic-Sign-(Back), Traffic-Sign-(Front), Trash-Can, Bicycle, Boat, Bus, Car, Caravan, Motorcycle, On-Rails, Other-Vehicle, Trailer, Truck, Wheeled-Slow, Car-Mount, Ego-Vehicle
